column4: lol! okay; so anyone please, am I doing something wrong? are the ati drivers not supposed to work "well" out of the box or something?
also, how do I know if my xorg.conf has 3d accel enabled or not? and what does the dri section mean? what happens if I disable it, might this solve the problem? (I think I read this somewhere)
DRI is the direct rendering interface
